name: Yars' Revenge (itch)
description:
Yars' Revenge

Click to start game.

Mouse to move, Left Click to shoot, Right click activates shield. Pick Shields up to gain more. Dodge incoming attacks and destroy the enemy sheilds and defeat the Qotile to win!

Programming, Art, and Design by Chris Rice and Trevor Westphal

Playtesting and Feedback from M. G. and A. C.

Music provided via Free Music Archive, courtesy of Three Chain Links, Ryan Anderson, and Herr Doktor

Made with Unity, Atom, Blender, Gimp, SFXR, Audacity

Source: https://github.com/twestpha/AtariGameJam
